reviewText:
You need to be able to defend yourself in a hurry? You need it for real life? You have no training partner and very little time?
BUY THIS VIDEO!! These are hard hitting, effective fighting moves designed to overcome your attacker in the blink of an eye. No there are not thousand techniques to counter any move an attacker might make, that's impossible but it contains a small series of moves (the R.A.T System) designed to fit most. And as a bonus you get interactive training sessions with Paul Vunak. The crux of it? You need a vicious, aggressive attitude to make the system work.
